content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal beliefs or predictions, but I can say that progress towards true individual freedom is being made daily. The fight for social justice and equality has been ongoing for many years, and while there have been strides made in many areas, there is still a lot of room for progress. In recent years, we have seen movements that challenge oppressive societal norms and advocate for individual autonomy and dignity. These movements have brought about significant changes, but they have also faced backlash from those who wish to maintain the status quo. Therefore, it is difficult to predict when we will reach a time when individuals are entirely free to be themselves without fear of judgment or persecution. However, the progress that has been made in recent years is a testament to the fact that change is possible, and if we continue fighting for social justice and equality, we will eventually see a society where everyone can live without fear or prejudice.
